snippet: Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief of Goldman Sachs, warned in an interview on Thursday on CNBC that the fiscal cliff threatens to derail the economic recovery.
abstract: Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief of Goldman Sachs, warned in an interview on Thursday on CNBC that the fiscal cliff threatens to derail the economic recovery.
lead_paragraph: Appearing alongside the authors of the Simpson-Bowles reform plan, Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief of Goldman Sachs, warned in an interview on Thursday on CNBC that the fiscal cliff threatens to derail the economic recovery. Erskine Bowles added that the media should be asking President Obama and Mitt Romney about specific solutions. And Alan Simpson warned that Americans should bet against stupidity in Congress. Read more »

headline.main: Blankfein Adds to Warnings About Fiscal Cliff

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Commission on Fiscal Responsibility and Reform
